backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing a persistent key-value map of labels, with functions to initialize defaults, add, rename, delete, and query labels.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (record export utility, export UI buttons, speech-to-text mic button) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and notable changes across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes, plus base body and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for MyOrganizer Pro PWA, loading two Google Fonts stylesheet links (Inter/Poppins/Roboto/Open Sans and Montserrat/Lato/Nunito/etc.) and the React app root script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for MyOrganizer Pro defining app name, display mode, theme colors, and two icon sizes for home screen installation.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first with network update strategy for static assets, with install, activate, fetch, and notification-click event handlers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing tab-based navigation across all app pages, lazy-loading NotesPage and RecordsPage, and initializing settings, seed data, and service worker on mount.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSp: Exports a spinning LoadingSpinner component in three sizes and a PageSkeleton placeholder used as Suspense fallbacks during lazy page loads.
frontend/src/components/common/Modal.tsx: Reusable accessible modal component with scroll lock, Escape key handling, focus management, configurable size, and a sticky header with optional close button.
frontend/src/components/common/ToastCont: Fixed-position toast notification container that renders success, error, and info toasts from the toast store with icons and dismiss buttons.
frontend/src/components/home/QuoteWidget: A clickable home widget that displays the user's daily quote (text, author, and styling) using the useQuote hook, with a navigation callback on click.
frontend/src/components/home/StreakWidge: A clickable home widget showing the user's current streak count, last check-in time, and a today indicator using the useStreak hook.
frontend/src/components/home/TodayRoutin: A clickable home widget that displays up to 4 items from today's routine profile (determined by day type) using the useRoutines hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout component that composes the desktop AppSidebar, main content area, and mobile BottomTabBar with active tab state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSideba: Desktop-only sidebar with logo, navigation buttons for all app tabs, and a footer attribution link; hidden on mobile via Tailwind.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomTab: Mobile-only fixed bottom navigation bar rendering tab buttons with active state indicators; hidden on desktop via Tailwind.
frontend/src/components/notes/LabelManag: Modal dialog for creating, renaming, and deleting note labels, including a confirmation overlay before deletion and bulk label reassignment on delete.
frontend/src/components/notes/MultiSelec: Fixed top toolbar shown during multi-note selection, providing archive, trash, and export (TXT/DOC/JSON) actions for the selected notes.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteCard.t: Card component for displaying a single note with support for selection (long-press or checkbox), pin indicator, color theming, and context menu actions (pin, archive, trash).
A modal component for creating and editing notes that supports text, checklist, and image note types with features including color picking, label selection, reminders, speech recognition, and export functionality.
frontend/src/components/notes/QuickAddBa: A collapsible bar component that lets users quickly create a new note by selecting from text, checklist, or image note types.
frontend/src/components/streak/CheckInBu: A button component that displays the current streak count and allows users to check in for the day, showing a disabled confirmed state after check-in.
frontend/src/components/streak/StreakCal: A monthly calendar component that visually highlights days the user has checked in, with navigation between months.
frontend/src/db/db.ts: Instantiates and exports a singleton OrganizerDB class that exposes typed Table instances for all app data stores (notes, routines, records, streak, quotes, labels, imageBlobs, settings).
frontend/src/db/idb.ts: A lightweight native IndexedDB wrapper that provides a Table class with CRUD operations (add, put, get, delete, toArray, count, clear) and handles database initialization with store/index creation.
frontend/src/db/schema.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for all database entities including Note, RoutineProfile, Record, StreakData, QuoteData, Label, ImageBlob, and AppSettings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor using the current identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageStorage.ts: A React hook providing saveImage, getImageUrl, and deleteImage callbacks for storing and retrieving image blobs in the IndexedDB imageBlobs table.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLabels.ts: Custom hook for managing labels in IndexedDB, providing CRUD operations (create, update, delete) with duplicate/reserved-name guards and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Custom hook for managing notes in IndexedDB, supporting create/update/delete/trash/archive/restore operations, filtering by view, search, and label, and bulk selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all labels and initializing default labels via the backend actor, with IndexedDB used for all other data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuote.ts: Custom hook for managing a motivational quote stored in IndexedDB, supporting save and rotation (shuffle or daily) modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecords.ts: Custom hook for managing records in IndexedDB with CRUD operations, search/date filtering, and JSON export functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoutines.ts: Custom hook for managing weekday and weekend routine profiles in IndexedDB, supporting item add/update/delete/reorder and completion toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollLock.ts: Custom hook that locks and unlocks body scroll by toggling CSS styles, preserving the scroll position when unlocked.
Custom React hook that wraps the browser's SpeechRecognition API, exposing controls to start/stop listening and state for transcripts, interim results, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreak.ts: Custom React hook that loads and manages a daily check-in streak from IndexedDB, handling streak counting, broken streaks, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind layers, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens including colors, typography, and app-specific variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component displaying a live clock, greeting, streak/quote/routine widgets, a quick-add note FAB, and a footer attribution link.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Full-featured notes page supporting search, label filtering, multi-select, note creation/editing via modal, and import/export in TXT, DOC, and JSON formats.
frontend/src/pages/QuotePage.tsx: Quote settings page allowing users to edit, style (font, size, color, alignment), and manage a rotating list of motivational quotes with a live preview.
frontend/src/pages/RecordsPage.tsx: A full-featured records management page with IndexedDB persistence for storing text entries with tags, images, and speech-to-text input, plus export functionality in TXT, DOC, and JSON formats.
frontend/src/pages/RoutinesPage.tsx: A routines management page supporting weekday/weekend profiles with drag-and-drop reordering, CRUD operations, speech recognition for input, and import/export in multiple formats.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: A settings page for customizing theme, accent color, font family, and background image, with storage usage display and full data import/export and clear functionality.
frontend/src/pages/StreakPage.tsx: A streak tracker page displaying current streak count, total check-ins, a check-in button, and a calendar view of check-in history.
frontend/src/store/appStore.ts: Zustand store managing global app settings (theme, accent color, font) with functions to apply and persist each setting to the DOM and localStorage.
frontend/src/store/toastStore.ts: Zustand store for managing toast notifications with auto-dismiss after 3.5 seconds and helper functions for success, error, and info toasts.
frontend/src/utils/dataValidation.ts: Validates the structure of imported JSON data, checking for required arrays (notes, routines, records, labels) and returning a result with any errors.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormatter.ts: Utility function that formats dates, timestamps, or strings into a human-readable '28 Feb 2026, 3:45 AM' format, handling edge cases like date-only strings and invalid input.
frontend/src/utils/imageCompression.ts: Utility functions to compress images to a specified max width and quality using an HTML canvas, with a separate helper for generating thumbnails.
frontend/src/utils/noteExport.ts: Provides functions to export notes (all or selected) as TXT, DOC, or JSON files by formatting note content and triggering browser downloads.
frontend/src/utils/noteImport.ts: Handles importing notes from JSON, TXT, or DOC files, parsing each format into Note objects with unique IDs and saving them to the database.
frontend/src/utils/notificationService.t: Provides utilities to request browser notification permission and schedule a delayed browser notification at a specified timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/recordExport.ts: Exports record entries as TXT, DOC, or JSON files, extracting title, body, date, and tags from each record and triggering browser downloads.
frontend/src/utils/routineExport.ts: Exports routine profiles and their items as TXT, DOC, or JSON files, formatting profile and item details and triggering browser downloads.
frontend/src/utils/routineImport.ts: Parses routine profiles from JSON, TXT, or DOC files into RoutineProfile objects with generated IDs and saves them to the database.
frontend/src/utils/seedData.ts: Seeds the IndexedDB database with initial sample data for notes, records, streaks, quotes, and routines if those tables are empty on first run.
frontend/src/utils/serviceWorkerRegistra: Registers the app's service worker (/sw.js) on page load to enable offline/PWA functionality, silently ignoring registration failures.
frontend/src/utils/storage.ts: Provides localStorage get/set helpers for small UI settings: theme (light/dark), accent color, and font family.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom font families, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state including version, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features for the Records and Routines sections (export formats, speech-to-text, image attachments).
